s.text: The Egypt massacre also tops the World-Wide news digest box at the WSJ , and is on the front at USAT , the WP and the LAT . It looks as if, reports the Times , there were no American victims.

The Egypt massacre also tops the World-Wide news digest box at the WSJ , and is on the front at USAT , the WP and the LAT . It looks as if, reports the Times , there were no American victims.
Most of the papers say that there were six shooters and that they were all killed by Egyptian forces.
The WP runs an AP story reporting that AOL has just hit 10 million subscribers.
